newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Surgutneftegaz to keep up production in 1997.
newsitem.headline: Surgutneftegaz to keep up production in 1997.

text.p: Russia's Surgutneftegaz oil company 1997 production figures will not fall below their 1996 level, Vladimir Bogdanov, the company's president told journalists.
"Production will certainly be more than 33 million tonnes", Bogdanov said on Saturday.
Surgutneftegaz produced 33,3 million tonnes of oil in 1996, the same as in 1995.

Bogdanov said the company posted a 1.8 percent increase in average daily production in the first five months of 1997 compared to the same period last year. --Aleksandras Budris, Moscow Newsroom (095) 941 8520
